translations.1: Yastaftoonaka qulil laahu yufteekum fil kalaalah; inim ru'un halaka laisa lahoo waladunw Wa-lahoo ukhtun falahaa nisfu maa tarak; Wa-huwa yarisuhaaa il lam yakkul lahaa walad; fa-in kaanatas nataini falahumas sulusaani mimmmaa tarak; Wa-in kaanooo ikhwatar rijaalanw Wa-nisaaa'an faliz-zakari mislu hazzil unsa-ya-iyn; yubaiyinul laahu lakum an tadilloo; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem
